# üìù R vs SAS Cheat Sheet ‚Äî Clinical Programming

This cheat sheet compares common tasks across R and SAS, based on the 7-module training program.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## üìÅ Module 1: Basics ‚Äî Language & Environment

| Task            | SAS              | R              |
|-----------------|------------------|----------------|
| Assign variable | `x = 5;`         | `x <- 5`       |
| Print output    | `put x;`         | `print(x)`     |
| Script file     | `.sas`           | `.R`           |
| Notebook        | Not native       | `.Rmd`, `.qmd` |
| IDE             | Enterprise Guide | RStudio        |
| Extensions      | Macros           | Packages       |

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## üì¶ Module 2: SDTM Programming

| Task | SAS | R (tidyverse + lubridate) |
|----|----|----|
| Read CSV/XPT | `proc import` / `libname xpt` | `read_csv()` / `read_xpt()` |
| Filter rows | `if visit=1;` | `filter(visit == 1)` |
| Create variable | `var = a + b;` | `mutate(var = a + b)` |
| Rename variables | `rename old=new;` | `rename(old = new)` |
| Derive ISO date string | `put(date, yymmdd10.);` | `as.character(ymd(date))` |
| Derive Study Day | `intnx('day',...)` + math | `--DY = date - RFSTDTC` |
| Sequence number | `retain` + `by` block | `mutate(SEQ = row_number())` |

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## üß¨ Module 3: ADaM Programming

| Task | SAS | R (admiral, dplyr) |
|----|----|----|
| Create ADSL from DM | `data adsl; set dm;` | `adsl <- dm %>% mutate(...)` |
| Derive flags (e.g. ASEVFL) | `if AESEV = "SEVERE" then ...` | `mutate(ASEVFL = if_else(...))` |
| Imputation | `if value = . then value = 0;` | `replace_na(value, 0)` |
| Merge | `merge ae adsl;` | `left_join(ae, adsl)` |
| Label variables | `label var = "Label";` | `xportr_label()` |
| Export XPT | `libname xpt ...; proc copy;` | `xportr_write()` |

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## üìã Module 4: Listings

| Task | SAS | R (flextable, gt) |
|----|----|----|
| PROC PRINT | `proc print data=ae;` | `print()` or `flextable()` |
| Custom listing | `proc report` | `gt()` or `flextable()` |
| Export to Word | `ods rtf file="...";` | `flextable::save_as_docx()` |
| Conditional formatting | `compute` blocks in REPORT | `theme_vanilla()`, `color()` |

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## üìä Module 5: Summary Tables

| Task            | SAS          | R (gtsummary)                   |
|-----------------|--------------|---------------------------------|
| PROC MEANS      | `proc means` | `summarise(mean(), sd())`       |
| PROC FREQ       | `proc freq`  | `count()`, `tbl_summary()`      |
| Grouped summary | `class trt;` | `group_by(trt) %>% summarise()` |
| Export summary  | `ods`        | `as_flex_table()`               |

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## üìà Module 6: Figures

| Task | SAS/GRAPH or SGPLOT | R (ggplot2, survminer, patchwork) |
|----|----|----|
| Boxplot | `proc sgplot; vbox val / group=trt;` | `ggplot() + geom_boxplot()` |
| Bar chart | `proc sgplot; vbar term / group=trt;` | `geom_col(position="dodge")` |
| KM Plot | `proc lifetest` | `survfit() + ggsurvplot()` |
| Combine plots | Panel layout | `patchwork` or `facet_wrap()` |

------------------------------------------------------------------------

## üß† Module 7: Full Workflow

| Task          | SAS                           | R                           |
|---------------|-------------------------------|-----------------------------|
| Workflow      | SAS macros + batch processing | Scripts + Copilot + Quarto  |
| Reuse code    | Macros                        | Functions, modules          |
| AI Assistance | Not available                 | GitHub Copilot (free)       |
| Debugging     | Log                           | R Console + inline comments |

------------------------------------------------------------------------

‚úÖ For any SAS task, there‚Äôs a tidyverse or admiral equivalent in R.\
üß† Use Copilot to accelerate your learning: try comments like `# create summary table` or `# plot AE counts by severity`.
